metadata.title: CVE-2015-6240 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
The chroot, jail, and zone connection plugins in ansible before 1.9.2 allow local users to escape a restricted environment via a symlink attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2015-6240` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ansible - 1.9.2+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ansible package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.2+dfsg-2').
